body:
Comment 3: 
Follow the instructions for the goinstall command.
http://golang.org/cmd/goinstall/

For example, on Windows 7,

C:\>cd c:\goeg\src\hello
C:\goeg\src\hello>set gopath=c:\goeg
C:\goeg\src\hello>set gopath
gopath=c:\goeg
C:\goeg\src\hello>goinstall -make=false .
C:\goeg\src\hello>..\..\bin\hello
